<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <entry>71388</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:colos_sl/130245</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_sl/130245</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_sl/130245</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Selektor hitrosti</string>
            <string language="en">A velocity selector</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Geschwindigkeit Selektor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un sélecteur de vitesse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um seletor da velocidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un selettore di velocità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας επιλογέας ταχύτητας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un selector de la velocidad</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Delovanje selektorja hitrosti na principu, da je ob pravi hitrosti sila na električni naboj v električnem in magnetnem polju enaka 0.</string>
            <string language="en">Basic principle of velocity selector - force on charged particle is zero in magnetic and electric field if particle speed is just right.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električno polje</string>
            <string language="en">electric field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetno polje</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">selektor hitrosti</string>
            <string language="en">velocity selector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektrika</string>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundprinzip des Geschwindigkeit Selektors - Kraft
auf belastetem Partikel ist in magnetischem null und elektrisch 
fangen Sie auf, wenn Partikelgeschwindigkeit gerade recht 
ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Principe de base de sélecteur de vitesse - la 
force sur la particule chargée est zéro dans le champ magnétique et
électrique si la vitesse de particules est simplement exacte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Princípio básico do seletor da velocidade - a 
força na partícula carregada é zero no campo magnético e elétrico
se a velocidade da partícula for apenas direita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Principio di base del selettore di velocità - la 
forza sulla particella caricata è zero nel campo elettrico magnetico 
e se la velocità della particella è solo di destra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασική αρχή του επιλογέα ταχύτητας - η δύναμη στο 
χρεωμένο μόριο είναι μηδέν στο μαγνητικό και ηλεκτρικό πεδίο 
εάν η ταχύτητα μορίων είναι ακριβώς σωστή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Principio de base del selector de la velocidad - 
la fuerza en partícula cargada es cero en campo magnético y 
eléctrico si la velocidad de la partícula apenas correcta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit Selektor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sélecteur de vitesse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'électricité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">seletor da velocidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">eletricidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo elettrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">selettore di velocità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">elettricità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιλογέας ταχύτητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo eléctrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">selector de la velocidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">electricidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
